DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the project is to study the risk of coccidioidomycosis (valley fever) in patients receiving anti-TNF and other biologic agents for inflammatory arthritis in Tucson, Arizona.
DOC.brief_title: Risk of Coccidioidomycosis in Patients Receiving Anti-TNF and Other Biologic Agents for an Inflammatory Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Retrospective chart review of all patients with an inflammatory arthritis seen at the University Rheumatology clinic since January 2000.
DOC.criteria: All active patients with an inflammatory arthritis seen at the University of Arizona from January 2000
